subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks for over-complicated boolean expressions. Currently, it finds code like if (b == true), b || true, !false, boolean a = q > 12 ? true : false, etc.
subsection.p: Rationale: Complex boolean logic makes code hard to understand and maintain.

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
